sourcesContent:
<template>
  <g v-if="drawable">
    <polygon :id="polygonId"
             :points="points"
             :style="quadStyle || defaultStyle"
             @mouseover="$emit('mouseover')"
             @mouseleave="$emit('mouseleave')"/>
    <circle :id="circleId" :cx="quad[0].x" :cy="quad[0].y" r="7" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="red"/>

    <animate v-if="blink"
             :href="'#' + polygonId"
             attributeName="stroke-opacity"
             repeatCount="indefinite"
             begin="0s"
             dur="1000ms"
             values="0.05; 0.99; 0.05"/>

    <animate v-if="blink"
             :href="'#' + circleId"
             attributeName="stroke-opacity"
             repeatCount="indefinite"
             begin="0s"
             dur="1000ms"
             values="0.05; 0.99; 0.05"/>

    <animate v-if="blink"
             :href="'#' + circleId"
             attributeName="fill-opacity"
             repeatCount="indefinite"
             begin="0s"
             dur="1000ms"
             values="0.05; 0.99; 0.05"/>
  </g>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: ['quad', 'quadStyle', 'blink'],
  computed: {
    drawable: function() {return this.quad.length === 4},
    points: function () {
      const q = this.quad
      return `${q[0].x},${q[0].y} ${q[1].x},${q[1].y} ${q[2].x},${q[2].y} ${q[3].x},${q[3].y}`
    },
    defaultStyle: function () {
      let defaultStyle = "stroke:purple;stroke-width:1;stroke-opacity:0.99;fill-opacity:0.5;"
      if(this.$store.state.annotation.boxingMode === 'letters') {
        return defaultStyle.concat("fill:lime;")
      } else {
        return defaultStyle.concat("fill:blue;")
      }
    }
  },
  data () {
    return {
      polygonId: Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 11),
      circleId: Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 11)
    }
  }
}

</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
